content.rendered:
Welcome To

York Street Spa

We Are Proud To Be An Aveda Lifestyle Salon And Spa.
Gallery
Contact

York Street Spa is located
in the heart of the Byward Market in Ottawa!

We Offer A Full-service Hair Salon, Facials, Massage, Waxing, Nail Services And An Infrared Sauna. We Also Have A Storefront Of Products To Fulfill Your Hair Care, Skincare And Cosmetic Needs.

Ottawa Spa

Spa

Indulge in ultimate pampering at our spa with a wide range of services, including waxing, facials, body treatments, manicures and pedicures, professional makeup, lash lifts and tints, foot care, and lash extensions. Each treatment is designed to rejuvenate and refresh you, ensuring you leave feeling revitalized and radiant. Discover the art of self-care with us and enjoy a truly luxurious experience from head to toe.

Explore

Ottawa massage

Massage Therapy

Our massage therapist use a variety of massage techniques tailored to fit your specific needs to increase circulation, relieve muscle tension and promote relaxation and flexibility.

Explore

Our Services

We Are Mindful Of Using Environmentally Friendly Products To Best Serve You And The World We Live In.

SPA

Explore

SALON

Explore

MEDI-SPA

Explore

SPA PACKAGES

Explore

GIFT CARDS

Explore

WEDDING

Explore

York Street Spa

About Us

Our Mission

At York Street Spa, we understand that every individual is unique. With that in mind, we understand that each being responds differently to stress and everyday surroundings.

Therefore, it only makes sense that each is treated to their needs. At York Street Spa, your gifted service provider is waiting to customize your spa service to your needs.

Our goal is to aid in reaching your physiological, emotional and spiritual peak. We are committed to exceeding the expectations of our clients while respecting the environment and nurturing the growth within our Ottawa spa team.

Explore

Hours of Operation

  • Sunday: 11 am – 5 pm
  • Monday: 11 AM - 5 PM
  • Tuesday: 10 am – 7 pm
  • Wednesday: 10 am – 7 pm
  • Thursday: 10 am – 7 pm
  • Friday: 10 am – 7 pm
  • Saturday: 9 am – 6 pm

Our Testimonials

 
 
 
  Good  
    
 Based on 197 reviews 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Helene Govinden 
 
2023-12-15
 
 
  
Jen gives the BEST facial I’ve ever had, her scalp massage is to die for! She’s also just so warm and friendly. Rose at reception was incredibly welcoming, taking my coat and offering me a beverage all with a smile! Thank you York Street Spa team! I highly recommend!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Myra 
 
2023-11-30
 
 
  
Favorite Hair Salon with exceptional service🩵

I always had a great experience at York Street Spa and I'm so glad I went back a few months ago. Since then, every appointments have been such a positive experience and one I would definitely recommend.
Aveda always did wonders for my hair and York Street Spa only use Aveda which makes a huge difference when coloring your hair.

I love the environment, everyone is so professional, kind and welcoming. They went above and beyond to be accommodating which was truly appreciated. You’re kindly offered a beverage when you check in, the waiting area is lovely and you are well taken care of throughout your appointment every time.

I was introduced to Michelle Nahmad at the York Street Spa and since my first appointment with her, I knew she was the one🤍
Michelle is a true artist and simply amazing at what she does. She is passionate about getting your hair to whatever shade you can dream up while still keeping your locks healthy and happy.

She is a great listener & always provides wonderful advice to achieve what I have in mind and nourishing my hair during the process. She is a perfectionist which I truly appreciate and the results are simply beautiful every time.

My color after only one visit exceeded my expectations, she does wonders with blond. Her professionalism, patience, skills and her attention to detail made each experiences so positive. I was hoping to match my color to hair extensions for a wedding and I was so happy with the results!

Whether you’re looking for a subtle change or wanting a full hair makeover, Michelle is a true master and I highly recommend her at the York Street Spa.

Thank you Michelle!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Carie Richard 
 
2023-11-13
 
 
  
Not my first time coming here and definitely won’t be the last. Victoria does a lovely job no matter what the request. Her attention to detail is impeccable. From her washing , colouring ,cutting to styling technique always 10/10. She works greaty with every texture and gives great advice on products to use. Thanks again, see you next appointment.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Hesam Ghasemi 
 
2023-11-12
 
 
  
Visited this place twice. A nice and relaxing environment to get a professional haircut.
The hairstylist Michelle is very nice and attentive, and she knows her craft well. She spends time and works with great finesse.
A testimony to her skills and her friendly character that I followed her from her old salon in Kanata to this place in downtown,
I am sure Michelle will be as popular in York St Spa as she was in her old salon!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Lolo Hotdog 
 
2023-11-10
 
 
  
Tanya and Andrea gave my aunt Sue and Laurie deluxe manicures . The manicures were the best we ever had. the ladies were extremely talented and they had great personalities and so much fun! I will definitely continue to bring my business there and will highly recommend them to all my friends.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Megghan Perez (mgghn) 
 
2023-07-24
 
 
  
Expressing my appreciation for the excellent service that was provided to me last week. Michelle's expertise and skills have truly impressed me.  Not only she carefully listened to my preferences, but she also provided valuable suggestions that complemented my overall look. I've received a lot of compliments since then. Michelle, you are talented!

I was booked initially to a different salon,  but it got canceled that day 15 minutes before my appointment -- yes very unprofessional. So, i looked for a nearby salon and Michelle was friendly and welcoming. I must admit I was quite embarrassed to come in and ask to accommodate a last-minute appointment for full highlights.

I was impressed by Michelle's professionalism and attention to detail for the duration of my appointment. She ensured that I was comfortable at all times. Evidently, she cares about clients’ satisfaction and well-being.

I am looking forward to my next visit! I won't hesitate to recommend her to my friends and family or to anyone.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Lillian Kitcher 
 
2023-07-07
 
 
  
My partner and I had an amazing day at York street spa. The spa staff were attentive and very welcoming. We had the pleasure of getting massages from Ingrid and Jason. We both felt like brand new people afterwards. We then got wonderful manicures, pedicures and facials from Marcia and Sasha- wow the foot massage during the pedicure from Marcia was Amazing, my partner felt so relaxed 😌 and chilled. We noticed a significant difference in our skin after the facials. Thank you for a really spectacular day and experience.  We look forward to coming back again.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Megan Floch 
 
2023-05-07
 
 
  
I had a great haircut with Michelle! She thoughtfully talked though my hair concerns and current routine before making some suggestions for my haircut. She checked in with me during the cut to make sure I was happy at every step and struck a perfect balance between pleasant conversation and serene silent moments. I was so happy with the results and would not hesitate to return for a cut in the future and wholeheartedly recommend Michelle to anyone looking for a skilled and kind stylist. Thanks for a wonderful experience, Michelle!

Gallery

Check out some of our clients rockin’ their locks!

The Looks You Want,
The Benefits Your Hair Needs.

Find your perfect product for a healthy scalp and stunning style:

SHOP aveda
